Charopid land snails (Gastropoda Pulmonata Charopidae) from Mayotte, Comores: alive and well

I. V. Muratov Muséum National d'Histoire Naturelle , 55 rue Buffon, 75005 , Paris , France , A. Abdou Muséum National d'Histoire Naturelle , 55 rue Buffon, 75005 , Paris , France & P. Bouchet Muséum National d'Histoire Naturelle , 55 rue Buffon, 75005 , Paris , France
Pages 171-208
Received 07 Feb 2005
Accepted 30 Jun 2005
Published online: 30 Jul 2012
